## CONTRIBUTING 

Wicked MMO Core can also server as a learning resource for aspiring developers who want to dive in to server / client game development.

If you want to contribute to the project, you will find resources in our [wiki](https://github.com/Wickedviruz/Wicked-MMO-server/wiki).

We also recommend you to read our [Contributor code of conduct](https://github.com/Wickedviruz/Wicked-MMO-server/tree/main/.github/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).

## AUTHORS & CONTRIBUTORS

This project exists thanks to the [authors]().


All contributors, big or small, are appriciated!

Thanks!
